_comment.description: Test: PR title contains explicit Linear issue ID

LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE.title: Fix session timeout bug
LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE.description: Users are getting logged out after 30 minutes of inactivity. Need to extend the session duration or implement token refresh.

title: EXP-165: Fix session timeout
author: karenying
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #201 - EXP-165: Fix session timeout
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/201
Status: open
Author: karenying

Description:
This PR fixes the session timeout issue referenced in EXP-165.

Changes:
- Extended session duration from 30 minutes to 24 hours
- Added token refresh logic on user activity
- Updated session middleware
